Breakpoints.Injector: Allocation Tab - Spaghetti/Counterfeit % to 0; Adventure Tab - Turn on Combat (Target: A Very Strange Place, Idle Mode, Allow Fallthrough -> Optionally enable ITOPOD after unlocking TM to get some PP); Gold Tab - Turn on CBlock Mode
Breakpoints.Comment: Put low targets on AT-0/1/2 and put high or infinite targets on AT-3/4. If we run long enough to unlock AT that means we need to focus on Wandoos for power (ie: NORB, NOTM, NOAUG, etc)
Breakpoints.CommentForNORB: Make sure to EAT the Yggdrasil Power fruit

Gear.Comment: Maximize TM & Wandoos, maximize gold drop accessories for NOTM

Beards.Note: After challenge block swap fumanchu beard to Beard Cage

Rebirth.Note: Unlock FoN and purchase the XP upgrade as soon as TC-5 is done
